name: User Registration with Validation
description: A process demonstrating pattern-based field validation

userRegistration.name: User Registration Form
userRegistration.prompt: Please fill out the registration form with valid information:

inputs.name: email
inputs.label: Email Address
inputs.patternDescription: Please enter a valid email address (e.g., user@example.com)

inputs.name: phone
inputs.label: Phone Number
inputs.patternDescription: Phone number must be in format: (555) 123-4567

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.patternDescription: Username must be 3-20 characters, letters, numbers, and underscores only

inputs.name: website
inputs.label: Personal Website (Optional)
inputs.patternDescription: Must be a valid URL starting with http:// or https://
